rules.ASSASSIN: The {% team %} spymaster has to remove all their remaining clothes.
rules.BYSTANDER: The {% other_team %} spymaster gets to nominate a member of the {% team %} team to remove one item of clothing.
rules.FRIENDLY_SPY: The {% team %} spymaster gets to nominate a member of the {% other_team %} team to remove one item of clothing.
rules.ENEMY_SPY: Everyone on the {% team %} team has to remove one item of clothing.
rules.VICTORY: Everyone on the {% other_team %} team has to remove one item of clothing.
